function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close physical interaction between service providers and customers","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict hygiene protocols, use of protective barriers, and regular testing","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, remote service delivery technology, and virtual communication tools","People":"Service providers, customers","Owner":"Service providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"High degree of interactivity in service delivery","Impact":"Higher probability of disease transmission due to close contact","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of customers, implementing spatial distancing, and promoting outdoor service options","Technologies":"Online booking systems, queue management apps, and contact tracing technology","People":"Service providers, customers","Owner":"Service providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Online service delivery with no physical interaction","Impact":"Reduced risk of disease transmission due to lack of physical contact","Mitigation":"Ensuring cybersecurity measures, monitoring for fake accounts, and verifying customer identities","Technologies":"Secure online platforms, identity verification software, and fraud detection tools","People":"Service providers, customers","Owner":"Service providers"}]}
